data.name: Lucky Tower Ultimate Demo
data.detailed_description:
A very early prototype is going to be released for Gamescom 2021 and is playable from August 23rd 'til the end of September. The prototype will allow a glimpse into the first segment of the game. The final version will be vastly improved and expanded in the coming years, so we are eager for feedback!



Lucky Tower Ultimate is a humor driven, narrative roguelike. The narcissistic, clumsy knight Von Wanst is trapped at the top of a mysterious tower and attempts to escape the vertical dungeon in an absurd adventure. On each of the tower’s floors he needs to decide between three doors that reveal deadly traps, monsters, or even other prisoners that might join his escape party. There’s tons of ways to get out of the tower and all characters react to the way you treat them. Selfishly slash your way down and use your companions to your advantage or safely reach the ground together as a team. Every action affects the emotional vibe of the world and creates a different story for your adventure!

Heavily relying on sassy slapstick humor, the game aims to have each run feel like an immersive cartoon.

Features!
  • From broccoli to dead enemies, everything in the game can be picked up and used as a weapon
  • Randomly generated levels and haircuts keep every playthrough fresh
  • Join forces with companions you meet or abuse their powers
  • Voice acting for all dialogues make for an immersive world
  • All characters react to the way you treat them - what goes around comes around
  • Hand-drawn 2D graphics
  • A hero that makes dying fun

data.short_description: Crude slapstick humor assists you, as you continue to fail escaping a dangerous tower in this unique narrative roguelike. Slashy slashy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
